member.name: T:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport
member.summary: Provides information for generating a report using a template from jsreport server. Multiple reports can exist for the same template code, since data-source may be different

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.Code
member.summary: A unique code for this report

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.Name
member.summary: A unique name of this report

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.Purpose
member.summary: Denotes the purpose of this report. Few possible values are 'Report', 'Email Body', 'Email Attachment', 'Document', etc.

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.Description
member.summary: A description of this report explaining the context, purpose and usage of this report

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.JsReportTemplate
member.summary: Information about the JSReport template that will be used to generate this report.

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.InputJsonSchema
member.summary: A JSON schema that is used for validating the input received by the caller to create a report

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.DataJsonSchema
member.summary: A JSON schema that is used for validating the report data received after invoking the data-source

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.DatasourceUrl
member.summary: A URL which when invoked is supposed to return data in JSON format

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.StorageAllowed
member.summary: Determines whether generated report files are allowed to be stored

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.GeneratedFileName
member.summary: The name that will be used for the generated report file

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.GeneratedFileExtension
member.summary: The extension that will be used for the generated file. Example extensions are PDF/pdf, HTML/html, xls, etc.

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.IReport.Active
member.summary: Determines if this report is currently active or not. This information may be used by interfaces in listing reports appropriately

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.JsReportTemplate.Code
member.summary: Unique code for the template that will generate a report. This template will exist in a jsreport server

member.name: P:UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.JsReportTemplate.Name
member.summary: Unique name of the template that will generate a report. This template will exist with a jsreport server
